data.message: Yelawolf is so good. He can sing amazing and his style is dope I think I like him more then Eminem and Eminem used to be my number 1 but lately hasn't impressed me as much as Yelawolf. When I was younger Eminem made me wanna rap now its Yelawolf, when I hear him I just wanna write again.

replies.message: Yela is shit compared to em. Even now. Yela is talented but eminem should have signed someone else in my opinion yela isnt even close to as good as so many of these unsigned artists
No just tired of hearing the same shit all the time and it's just my opinion that's all. My taste changes all the time.
